response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
